description: This file defines a singly linked list implementation in Kotlin, including operations to add, remove, retrieve elements, and get the size of the list.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list class supporting basic list operations such as add, remove, get, and size.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: A private inner class representing a node in the linked list, containing data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Removes a node from the list by adjusting references.

methods.name: tail
methods.description: A companion object function to find the last node in the list starting from a given head.
